title: Eldorado Gold to Buy Foran for $2.8 Billion in Latest Mine Deal Amid Metals Frenzy
description: Eldorado Gold Corp. agreed to buy copper-focused Foran Mining Corp. for C$3.8 billion ($2.8 billion), the latest industry tie-up as miners seek to ramp up metals production after a massive price rally over the past year.
